name: Blue Skies Flight School
about: Blue Skies Flight School, located at the Edmond / Guthrie airport in Oklahoma, offers comprehensive flight training from introductory levels to advanced certifications. We provide training for single engine Private, Instrument, Commercial, Flight Instructor, and ATP certificates. Our programs include personalized guidance, ground training in subjects like weather and regulations, and extensive flight time. An introductory flight, costing $125, allows prospective students to experience flight training and log hours towards their license. Our fleet includes well-equipped Cessna aircraft, and we offer additional services such as flight reviews and recurrent training. With a commitment to safety and proficiency, Blue Skies Flight School is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals. Contact us today to start your flight training journey.
